dialogue: I'm already using a mug. I can't take another. Why do you think God gave us two hands? One to hold a mug, and the other to...well, I guess it could theoretically hold a mug as well, but that would just look ridiculous.
I'd have a mug in each hand, like an inspector. Clomp, clomp, clomp, cup of tea, cup of tea, cup of tea...
